dcsl_miabot_low_level_control.cc

00001 #include "ros/ros.h"
00002 #include "ros/console.h"
00003 #include "geometry_msgs/Twist.h"
00004 #include "geometry_msgs/Pose.h"
00005 #include "geometry_msgs/PoseArray.h"
00006 #include "dcsl_messages/TwistArray.h"
00007 #include "dcsl_miabot_control_math.h"
00008 
00011 
00012 // \author Will Scott
00013 
00015 class MiabotLowLevelController
00016 {
00017 public:
00018   int numRobots;
00019   ros::NodeHandle n;
00020   ros::Publisher Pub_low_level;
00021   ros::Subscriber Sub_state;
00022   ros::Subscriber Sub_waypoint;
00023   ros::Subscriber Sub_velocity;
00024 
00025 private:
00026   // store latest waypoint as a vector, ordered with
00027   // all x values, all y values, then all theta values, 
00028   // so the waypoint for robot j would be x = waypoints[j], 
00029   // y = waypoints[numRobots+j], and theta = waypoints[numRobots*2 + j]
00030   std::vector<double> waypoints_x;
00031   std::vector<double> waypoints_y;
00032   std::vector<double> waypoints_theta;
00033   const double k1;
00034   const double k2;
00035   
00036 public:
00042   MiabotLowLevelController(const ros::NodeHandle& node_handle, 
00043     const int numBots, const double k1, const double k2) :
00044       numRobots(numBots),
00045       n(node_handle),
00046       Pub_low_level(),
00047       Sub_state(),
00048       Sub_waypoint(),
00049       Sub_velocity(),
00050       waypoints_x(numBots),
00051       waypoints_y(numBots),
00052       waypoints_theta(numBots),
00053       k1(k1),
00054       k2(k2)  
00055   {}
00056 
00062   void init(bool use_waypoint)
00063   {
00064     // create Publisher object where output will be advertised
00065     // template type in < > is the message type to be published
00066     Pub_low_level =  n.advertise<dcsl_messages::TwistArray>("cmd_vel_array", 1);
00067 
00068     if (use_waypoint)
00069     {
00070       // create Subscriber objects to collect states and new waypoint commands
00071       Sub_state    = n.subscribe("state_estimate",1,&MiabotLowLevelController::stateCallback,this);
00072       Sub_waypoint = n.subscribe("waypoint_input",1,&MiabotLowLevelController::waypointCallback,this);      
00073     }
00074     else
00075     {
00076       // create subscriber for velocity inputs
00077       Sub_velocity = n.subscribe("velocity_input",1,&MiabotLowLevelController::velocityCallback,this);
00078     }
00079   }
00080 
00086   void stateCallback(const geometry_msgs::PoseArray states)
00087   {
00088     // when new state estimate is made, compute desired velocity from
00089     // the most recent waypoint info for each robot
00090     ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("received state message");
00091     if(int(states.poses.size()) == numRobots)
00092     {
00093       dcsl_messages::TwistArray velocities;
00094       geometry_msgs::Twist currentTwist;
00095       double pos[3];
00096       double way[3];
00097       double outputVel[2];
00098 
00099       for (int i = 0; i < numRobots; i++) // loop through the robots
00100       {
00101         pos[0] = states.poses[i].position.x;
00102         pos[1] = states.poses[i].position.y; 
00103         pos[2] = states.poses[i].orientation.z;
00104         way[0] = waypoints_x[i];
00105         way[1] = waypoints_y[i];
00106         way[2] = waypoints_theta[i];
00107         
00108         // call function to compute outputVel = [v,omega]
00109         miabot_waypoint(outputVel,pos,way,k1,k2);
00110 
00111         // place that into velocities message
00112         currentTwist.linear.x = outputVel[0];
00113         currentTwist.angular.z = outputVel[1];
00114         velocities.twists.push_back(currentTwist);
00115       }
00116       ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("  publishing velocity message");
00117       Pub_low_level.publish(velocities);
00118     }
00119     else
00120     {
00121       ROS_ERROR_STREAM("number of states did not match numRobots, skipping...");
00122     }  
00123   }
00124 
00129   void waypointCallback(const geometry_msgs::PoseArray newWaypoints)
00130   {
00131     ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("received waypoint message");
00132     if(int(newWaypoints.poses.size()) == numRobots)
00133     {
00134       for (int i = 0; i < numRobots; i++) // loop through the robots
00135       {
00136         waypoints_x[i]     = newWaypoints.poses[i].position.x;
00137         waypoints_y[i]     = newWaypoints.poses[i].position.y;
00138         waypoints_theta[i] = newWaypoints.poses[i].orientation.z;
00139       }
00140     }
00141     else
00142     {
00143       ROS_ERROR_STREAM("number of waypoints did not match numRobots, skipping...");
00144     }
00145   }
00146 
00155  void velocityCallback(const geometry_msgs::PoseArray velocityPose)
00156   {
00157     if(int(velocityPose.poses.size()) == numRobots)
00158     {
00159       dcsl_messages::TwistArray velocities;
00160       geometry_msgs::Twist currentTwist;
00161       for (int m = 0; m < numRobots; m++)
00162       {
00163         currentTwist.linear.x = velocityPose.poses[m].position.x;
00164         currentTwist.angular.z = velocityPose.poses[m].orientation.z;
00165         velocities.twists.push_back(currentTwist);
00166       }
00167       Pub_low_level.publish(velocities);
00168     }
00169     else
00170     {
00171       ROS_ERROR_STREAM("number of velocity inputs did not match numRobots, skipping...");
00172     }
00173   }
00174 };
00175 
00180 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00181 {
00182   // initialize the node, with name miabot_waypoint_control
00183   ros::init(argc, argv, "miabot_waypoint_control");
00184 
00185   // create the NodeHandle which tells ROS which node this is
00186   ros::NodeHandle n;
00187 
00188   // collect number of robots from parameter server (default 1)
00189   int numRobots;
00190   n.param<int>("/n_robots", numRobots, 1);
00191 
00192   // collect waypoint control gains from parameter server
00193   double k1, k2;
00194   n.param<double>("waypoint_gain_1", k1, 0.7);
00195   n.param<double>("waypoint_gain_2", k2, 0.5);
00196 
00197   // check command line args to see whether to use waypoint or velocity control
00198   bool use_waypoint;
00199   if (argc > 1 && std::string(argv[1])=="--way")
00200   {
00201     use_waypoint = true;
00202   }
00203   else if (argc > 1 && std::string(argv[1])=="--vel")
00204   {
00205     use_waypoint = false; // use velocity control
00206   }
00207   else
00208   {
00209     use_waypoint = true; // default for no flag specified
00210     ROS_INFO_STREAM("No arg for control type, defaulting to waypoint");
00211   }
00212 
00213   // create and initialize the controller object
00214   MiabotLowLevelController mllc(n, numRobots, k1, k2);
00215   mllc.init(use_waypoint);
00216 
00217   // loop through callback queue until node is closed
00218   ros::spin();
00219 
00220   return 0;
00221 }
